commands:
The current list of commands supported are: 

    __** *help <command>**__ - List all of the current commands if no argument is given. If agrument is specified the description for the argument will be listed. Current help arguments are: 

 startHydration 
 stopHydration 
 updateHydration 
 hydration 
 whoAThot 

    __** *hyrdation **__ - List all hydration related commands 

   __** *startHyrdation <x Minutes> **__ - Starts a hydration reminder for the Discord User 

   __** *stopHydration **__ - Stops hydration reminders for the Discord User 

    __** *updateHydration <x Minutes> **__ -  Updates the hydration time interval for the Discord User 

   __** *whoAThot **__ - Randomly generates a thot 



 Command Notes: Commands with <text> are arguments to be supplied with the command.
startHydration: __** *startHydration <x Minutes> **__ - Starts a hydration reminder for the Discord User
stopHydration: __** *stopHydration **__ - Stops hydration reminders for the Discord User
updateHydration: __** *updateHydration <x Minutes> **__ -  Updates the hydration time interval for the Discord User
